about_the_game:
Paradise Cleaning! - VARIANTBIRTH - is super-casual action game.
All you have to do is just cleaning out all dirty icons by dragging over them within the time limit.
There are 5+1 dirty icons and each of them can be cleaned by the corresponding Cleaning tools.

NOTE.
All in-game text has been translated using machine translation.


[CHARACTER]

●Akari Tachibana●



Akari Tachibana
She is shy, quiet, and unobtrusive.
She has a strong admiration for her older sister, Erika, and aspires to become a xenomorph hunter.
The V-Device she was given is the type Chrysalid.
Her image color is red.
She deploys an absolute field centered on herself.
The deployed force field repels all attacks and does not allow the intrusion of gases, liquids, or even microparticles.


●Sayaka Todo●



Sayaka Todo
When she was a child, she was almost raped by a xenomorph,
She has come to feel aversion to the way males look at her, regardless of whether they are human or deformed.
The V-Device she was given is a Type Luciole.
His image color is blue.
It disguises the sniper's position by optically penetrating and splitting the sniper's own image.


●Isuka Koga●



Isuka Koga
For the sake of his family left behind outside the city, he aims to hunt monsters.
Due to his strong desire for success, he can also be aggressive towards others.
The V-Device he was given is Type Lucanid.
His image color is emerald.
He surrounds both his arms and legs with pseudo-gravity, crushing his target to death.


●Erika Tachibana●



Erika Tachibana
Erika Tachibana is the head of the school city of Aigis.
She has the authority to command the instructors, make decisions on the management of the school, and negotiate with, accept, and reject governments outside the city.
He is the heart of the school city.
He was once renowned as one of the world's best xenomorph hunters, but retired to train younger generations.
He is now in charge of his current duties.



Features
Easy-to-play design
20 stages
20 adult CGs
11 Achievements

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace.
Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

This game contains the following content
Sex without consent
Extreme play
Intercourse with pregnant women
Monstrous rape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
